Title: FPGA Developer – Singapore
Description:
Sophisticated Prop Trading Firm
Singapore
Posted 2 Wks Ago
Salary: up to 250-275k SGD base

Summary
High-frequency prop trading firm with offices worldwide is looking to expand its Trading Platforms teams with a talented FPGA Developer.
This team develops, improves, and governs the platforms via which trading teams access markets, as well as enabling Risk Technology to control market access and trading. In this role, your main focus will be working collaboratively with software developers across the business to architect low-latency connections to global financial exchanges. You’ll build advanced Ethernet-based comms stacks direct from chip to SFP, integrate network stacks to connect to various exchanges, and develop an optimal interface between FPGA hardware and user space software.
You will be expected to be a skilled communicator, able to clearly document specifications and solve difficult technical problems in a fast-paced, dynamic environment.
Requirements
Bachelor’s degree in Electrical Engineering, or equivalent professional experience
5-10 years of FPGA development experience, including expert-level knowledge of FPGA products (Xilinx preferred), development tools, and related simulators
Verilog or System Verilog programming (ASIC development via VHDL or Verilog experience will be considered)
C or C++ programming
Experience with Ethernet protocols, pci-e, and/or switching and routing in network equipment, parsing and traffic shaping
Experience in FPGA design flow including synthesis, place & route, static timing analysis
A strong understanding of network PHY interfacing
NB: Please don’t apply if you are a fresh graduate.
Benefits
Competitive salary + performance-based bonuses
Generous benefits, including medical insurance and gym membership
Collaborative and friendly environment with smart, highly engaged colleagues
Relaxed, dress-down office culture, with breakfast, lunch and snacks provided
Job Type
Permanent
Specialties
C/C++,FPGA,Hardware,HFT,Prop Trading,Software Engineer,Verilog

Title: Nginx Expert Engineer
Description:
Job Description:
We are currently seeking an experienced engineer with deep understanding and extensive experience in Nginx to join our team. As the company's Nginx expert, you will be responsible for designing, configuring, and maintaining high-performance, highly available Nginx server environments to support the stable operation of our products and services.
Responsibilities:
Design, deploy, and optimize Nginx server architecture to ensure high performance, availability, and security.
Develop Nginx-related modules to meet business requirements.
Configure and manage Nginx reverse proxy, load balancing, caching, and other features.
Analyze and optimize Nginx configurations to improve server performance and response times.
Monitor and debug Nginx servers to promptly identify and resolve performance issues and failures.
Collaborate closely with the development team to provide technical support and recommendations, resolving Nginx-related technical challenges.
Continuously track and evaluate the latest technologies and trends in Nginx, driving technical innovation and improvement.
Requirements:
Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science or equivalent with 5+ years of relevant experience.
Extensive experience in Nginx configuration and management.
Experience in developing Nginx modules, familiar with various Nginx modules and features.
Deep understanding of HTTP, TCP/IP, load balancing, reverse proxy, and other network principles and protocols.
Proficiency in Linux systems and command-line tools, with excellent system administration and troubleshooting skills.
Experience in one or more programming languages such as Java, C, Go, Shell, Python.
Master the technical principles and best practices of related middleware (such as redis, elasticsearch, MySQL, Kafka, K8S, Docker, etc.).
Excellent communication skills and teamwork spirit, able to collaborate closely with the development team and other technical teams.
Other Info:
Working hours: 9am to 6pm, Monday to Firday.
Working location: Bugis
Salary Range :6000-10000 per month + AWS
Job Types: Full-time, Permanent, Fresh graduate
Salary: $6,000.00 - $10,000.00 per month

Title: Software Test Engineer
Description:
We are Nexteer Automotive, a MNC – a leader in intuitive motion control – a multibillion-dollar global steering and driveline business delivering electric and hydraulic steering systems, steering columns and driveline systems, as well as ADAS and automated driving technologies for OEMs around the world.

You have good understanding and skills in ECU verification and validation in automotive electronic domain where quality and performance are crucial. You will develop test cases from functional requirements and define test plans to test complex embedded software features and communication protocols to meet project schedule. You have strong teamwork, communication skills and is comfortable with work challenges. You can lead and develop validation and verification knowhow and capability.

Senior engineer position may be offered depending on merit.

Job Description
1. Lead and develop Validation and Verification knowhow and capability for embedded systems
2. Analyze and de-compose customer, system, and safety requirements into software requirements
3. Response for the customer software testing implementation and communication
4. Define the test plan and test strategy based on software build plan and project schedule
5. Review and design software test cases according to the requirements
6. Perform software integration test, software unit test and system test based on V model and ASPICE
7. Log anomaly reports, support debugging and test bug-fix
8. Support software developer and system engineer on debugging
9. Coordinate with electrical application team to close test issues
10. Maintain test bench and test tools including calibration of test equipment
11. Soldering of PCB boards, wire harness and simulator box prototype making and assembly
12. Get quotations from vendors, raise purchase orders and payment requests
13. Accept other job responsibilities as required by software V&V supervisor
14. Maintain safety and good housekeeping

Job Requirements
1. Have at least 4 years of work experience in Validation and Verification of ECU in automotive industry
2. Have Bachelor degree or above in Electrical, Electronic, Computer or Software Engineering
3. Have good oral and written communication skills in English; Can speak clear & fluently for technical communication with US and China technical centers.
4. Able to attend night conference calls occasionally
5. EPS hardware, software and system knowledge is preferred
6. Able to travel to Suzhou China for training and work

Core Competencies
1. Ability to create complex software or system test scenarios based on functional requirements
2. Working knowledge of CAN/CAN-FD and Flexray communication in vehicular network messages and diagnostic services
3. Experience in UDS protocol and CAN/CAN-FD testing
4. Familiarity with basic tools for CAN/CAN-FD and Flexray communication network
5. Experience in Vector vTESTstudio or dSpace Autodesk
6. Experience in Vector CANoe, CANape, Diva and Candelastudio
7. Experience in HIL setup based on dSpace, VTsystem or Labview solutions preferred
8. C programming is a Must
9. Python, Vector CAPL and CASL programming preferred
10. Ability to review and find defects from Matlab models or directly from C code
11. Experience in using requirement management tools such as IBM Rational Doors
12. Experience in using IBM Rational Change and Synergy.
13. Familiarity with Autosar Architecture is plus
14. Familiarity with serial transmission protocol such as SPI, I2C, SENT
15. Familiarity with using the Oscilloscope
16. Familiarity with ISO26262 functional safety and software safety mechanisms such as memory protection units and watchdogs is plus
17. Familiarity with MISRA C standards
18. Understand the automotive system and software development process in V-model
19. Excellent debug and troubleshooting skills
20. Independent and matured

Candidates who do not have all the required competencies and skills but have positive attitudes and are keen in automotive system and software testing are encouraged to apply.

Fresh university graduates are also welcome to apply.

Title: Software Engineer, International (Singapore)
Description:
The International Team in Coinbase is tasked with expanding the presence and reach of Coinbase products to countries across the globe. Currently we are focusing on giving easy Fiat Payment rails access and a smooth, compliant and delightful Onboarding experience to customers in countries where Coinbase is currently present. In parallel, the team is also exploring products that make sense in the context of the particular country/region.

What you'll be doing:
Work with engineers, designers, product managers and senior leadership to turn our product and technical vision into a tangible roadmap every quarter.
Write high quality, well tested code to meet the needs of your customers
Solve unique, large scale, highly complex technical problems
Requirements:
You have at least 6 months of experience in software engineering, or done internships in the relevant fields. Fresh grads are welcomed to apply.
Degree in Bachelor/Masters degree in a quantitative field (ex Math, Stats, Physics, or Computer Science).
Have experience in any OO programming experience (in a class, for fun, at a job). Most of our systems are written in Golang, JavaScript and experience with any is a plus.
Enjoy thinking about how people interact with products and building experiences that users love

Approach problems with positive energy

Title: Aviation Data Scientist / Software Engineer
Description:
MITRE ASIA PACIFIC SINGAPORE (MAPS)

AVIATION Data Scientist / Software Engineer

Under the initial sponsorship of Civil Aviation Authority of Singapore (CAAS), The MITRE Corporation, a U.S.-based, globally renowned research and development company, established its premier air traffic management research center in Singapore to support the growth in the Asia Pacific Region. This research center, MITRE Asia Pacific Singapore (MAPS), is in need of an Associate/Intermediate Data Scientist / Software Engineer to be part of a dynamic team of professionals working to improve air traffic operations in Singapore and the Asia Pacific region. The ideal candidate possesses excellent verbal and written technical communication skills, strong analytical abilities, the desire to acquire new skills, and the trait of being self-driven.

Key responsibilities include:

Develop, maintain, and monitor data analytics that produce high quality data
Analyze and visualize data products to derive insights and assess data quality
Continuously improve the codebase and our development/deployment processes
Consult with analysts and data consumers to ensure their needs are met
Collaborate with peers during sprint planning, technical discussions, and code reviews
Write clean and testable code that works consistently, both locally and on the compute cluster

Minimum Requirements:

Good honours degree in in Computer Science, Mathematics, or other physical science/engineering fields), or equivalent practical experience
0-5 years relevant work experience

Preferred Qualifications:

Air Traffic Management / Aviation data experience is a +

Experience with software development using Java, Python, and/or another high-level programming language
Experience with data science techniques, data analysis, modeling, and visualization using Python, R, and/or Clojure
Experience with Git version control software
Familiarity with big data, distributed systems, and/or cloud platforms (Hadoop, AWS, Spark, Kafka, etc.)
Familiarity with Agile and DevOps principles and practices
Comfortable learning new languages and ideas
Creative problem solvers and risk takers
Ability to collaborate effectively with teammates, technical partners, and stakeholders

Fresh University graduates are encouraged to apply. Preference will be given to candidates who have knowledge of and/or experience in the field of air traffic operations. There is currently one opening. Interested candidates should inquire within The MITRE Corporation by emailing JOBS@mitreasiapacific.sg by 25 April 2024.

Description:
What will I work on?
The candidate is a skilled engineer and works physics simulations, 3D volume image construction, signal processing, electromagnetic control with AI.
Our aim is to align you with the activities which truly interest you; will stretch you technically; help you grow and impact on millions of patients.

1. Strong mathematical skills - good foundations of linear algebra, matrix, differential algebra, statistics.
2. Strong physics skills - good knowledge of electromagnetism, finite element methods, and classical mechanics.
3. Strong problem solving and engineering skills.
4. Strong python, C++ or java coder

7. Published papers in top machine learning or computer vision conferences, ICML/NIPS/CVPR/ICCV

Education:
Bachelor's, Master's or PhD degree in Engineering or Computer Science or Mathematics or Physics.

Location:
Singapore, Beijing

Master, Teach, Learn - The opportunity to work with, learn from and share knowledge with ultra-smart colleagues in a culture of collaboration and technical excellence. We groom our employees and make sure that they stay at the cutting edge of the technology stack.
Impact - Huge potential to make a positive contribution across our business, people and partners
Remuneration – Competitive pay with share award for top performers.
We are also willing to groom engineers and fresh graduates who don’t have a background in deep learning but are interested to learn. You will also have the opportunity to attend top machine learning conferences like NIPS and ICML.

Title: Blockchain Engineer
Description:
Location: Singapore
Job Type: On-site, Full-time

What You Will Be Doing –
Design, code, test, deploy, maintain, and improve performance-critical backend software up and down the blockchain technology stack: from P2P networking, to consensus libraries, to smart contract executors.
Read research papers presenting cutting-edge developments in distributed systems and cryptography, and then work on applying these new insights into new and existing production systems.
Contribute to a variety of open-source projects: not only those initiated by ParallelChain Lab.
Create high quality, easy-to-understand written assets for developers to build on our platforms.
Ensure proper documentation and knowledge transfer.
Review your peers' work.
Qualifications –
Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science or related fields, or knowledge equivalent to that covered in a Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science or a related field.
Fresh graduates, as well as engineers with non-typical education backgrounds are welcome: we recognise that a lot of amazing programmers are self-taught!
Applicants with 5+ years experience or holding a Ph.D degree will be considered for the role of Senior Staff Engineer.
An aptitude for writing fault-tolerant, performant, distributed systems.
A working understanding of the most commonly-used cryptographic primitives, e.g., symmetric encryption, public key crypto systems, MACs, hashes and digital signatures.
A correct model of how operating systems work. “Schedules”, "system calls", "swapping", "paging" should be familiar vocabulary to you.
Desired skills: programming languages and/or discrete mathematics.
Work Environment & Benefits –
International team, with English as the main communication language.
Medical insurance with dental coverage.
Marriage leaves, compassionate leaves, etc.
Employee stock options & token allocation (performance-based).

Title: RF/Analog IC Engineer
Description:
Job Responsibilities:
1. Circuit and system design of RF/analog transceiver IC based on CMOS technology
2. Schematic design, behavioral and circuit-level simulation, circuit implementation, layout design and test

Job Requirements:
1. A master's degree or above in microelectronics, communications, electronic engineering and other related majors; more than 3 years of relevant experience
2. Good know-how on RF/analog circuit theory and analysis; Good understanding of design process of RF/analog IC
3. Solid experience in the following module/block design and test: VCO, PLL, LNA, PA, MIXER, PMU, ADC, DAC, etc.
4. Good communication skills and team spirit.
5. Fresh MS graduates are welcome.

Title: Blockchain Engineer
Description:
Job Summary

Salary
S$4,500 - S$8,000 / Monthly

Job Type

Seniority
Junior

Years of Experience
At least 1 year

Job Description
Location: Singapore
Job Type: On-site, Full-time

What You Will Be Doing –
Design, code, test, deploy, maintain, and improve performance-critical backend software up and down the blockchain technology stack: from P2P networking, to consensus libraries, to smart contract executors.
Read research papers presenting cutting-edge developments in distributed systems and cryptography, and then work on applying these new insights into new and existing production systems.
Contribute to a variety of open-source projects: not only those initiated by ParallelChain Lab.
Create high quality, easy-to-understand written assets for developers to build on our platforms.
Ensure proper documentation and knowledge transfer.
Review your peers' work.
Qualifications –
Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science or related fields, or knowledge equivalent to that covered in a Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science or a related field.
Fresh graduates, as well as engineers with non-typical education backgrounds are welcome: we recognise that a lot of amazing programmers are self-taught!
Applicants with 5+ years experience or holding a Ph.D degree will be considered for the role of Senior Staff Engineer.
An aptitude for writing fault-tolerant, performant, distributed systems.
A working understanding of the most commonly-used cryptographic primitives, e.g., symmetric encryption, public key crypto systems, MACs, hashes and digital signatures.
A correct model of how operating systems work. “Schedules”, "system calls", "swapping", "paging" should be familiar vocabulary to you.
Desired skills: programming languages and/or discrete mathematics.
Work Environment & Benefits –
International team, with English as the main communication language.
Medical insurance with dental coverage.
Marriage leaves, compassionate leaves, etc.
Employee stock options & token allocation (performance-based).

Title: Sales Engineer
Description:
NACT Engineering provides drones accessories for all sizes and use-cases. Our intimate knowledge of robotics systems places us at the forefront of a burgeoning mechanical revolution. As a company at the cutting edge of engineering and robotics, we are looking for a suitable candidate that will push NACT forward as a bespoke drone solutions provider for our clients in the APAC region.
Highlights of working at NACT
Competitive compensation package remunerated based on skill and experience.
High level of autonomy on the job with training opportunities provided for upskilling and learning
Open culture and collaborative environment
High growth industry

Job Description (Sales Engineer)
The sales engineer is responsible for products demonstration and general sales, reporting to the sales manager. We seek a self-motivated professional that is able to engage customers with good people relation experience. A good track record in sales is a plus. The Sales engineer is responsible for helping the sales manager to close technical sales requiring technical demonstration and/or technical customization. Thus, the sales engineer needs to be able to hear and identify customer problems and issues, and to discuss with customer on how our products can help them.
Duties of the sales executive include walking the ground and meeting customers, closing technical sales and designing strategic sales/marketing plans and evaluating competition. Commission will be served based on confirmed sales.

Responsibilities
Understanding company products technically and eventually be able to operate them independently
Coordinating with sales representatives & sales manager to serve customers
Create sales by both serving existing and new customers
Strategize and report to the sales manager both ground & customer feedbacks
Help identify other technical issues customers face to the technical manager to strategize future product development
Build pipeline and maintain long-term relationships with prospects
Identify new business opportunities to generate opportunities

Qualifications
Diploma, Bachelor's degree or equivalent experience
Fresh graduate welcomed
Salary package will commensurate with experience and sales target

Title: Digital IC Engineer
Description:
Responsibilities
Functional blocks and/or subsystems of digital ASICs from design to silicon verification. This includes RTL coding, verification, silicon validation, and qualification.
Proactively work with other team members and partners to align on specifications, conduct reviews, and complete documentation.
Contribute to ASIC roadmaps and future innovation.
Develop technical leadership skills.
Participate in co-development activities to help prototype ASIC designs in FPGA or other software models to support pre-silicon firmware development and verification.

Education And Experience Required
BS or MS degree in electrical engineering or equivalent with focus on VLSI design experience
Fresh MS graduates are welcome.

Knowledge And Skills
Knowledge of submicron semiconductor technology
Familiar with digital ASIC/SOC design flow from RTL to silicon characterization
Familiar with Synopsys and Cadence EDA tools for Simulation, Synthesis, Timing (STA), Formal and Assertion based verification, etc.
Familiar with design and programming languages: Verilog, System Verilog, Python, Perl, C, C++, etc.
Ability to apply analytical and problem-solving skills
Strong written and verbal communication skills, ability to negotiate design features and options
Knowledge of embedded system design, verification, and product development lifecycle
Deep knowledge and domain know-hows in ARM/RISC-V microprocessor subsystem

Title: Technical Support Engineer
Description:
About the company
LANDI: Pioneers in Payment and Merchant Solutions
LANDI has been a trusted name in payment and merchant solutions for 18 years, supported by a dedicated team of over 500 employees. Each year, we proudly distribute 8 million POS devices globally.
Our product range includes versatile POS devices, Electronic Cash Registers, and software solutions, all designed to simplify payment processing, sales tracking, inventory management and data capture for businesses.
As a reliable technology partner, our commitment is to provide superior quality products and services to our clients. Innovation lies at the heart of LANDI's operations, driving us to constantly evolve and shape the "future of commerce".

Role and responsibilities
As Technical Support Engineer, you will provide technical support to LANDI customers in the APAC region, mainly by answering to JIRA tickets. Depending on the customer type (ISV, distributor, acquirer mainly) and priority, you will:
Be assigned to JIRA tickets from customers when troubleshooting
Be able to identify a HW or SW issue and route accordingly
Be able to perform analysis, reproduce problems and escalate according to LANDI’s processes
Make sure that the ticket is resolved according to the Service Level Agreement in place between LANDI and its customer
Populate the internal LANDI’s knowledge base and FAQ so your experience serves all LANDI’s customers worldwide

You are autonomous, accountable, professional and able to do transversal management among various regions. You are curious and like digging into technical issues.
You are experienced in IT and computer science and able to write/debug code on Linux and Android devices.
Ideally you have an experience in payment industry (EMV, Nexo) and security (symmetric and asymmetric cryptography, PKI, encryption, signature).
You have prior experience in Linux and Android development.
You are motivated to join a new team and able to propose improvements and take initiatives in a fresh new international environment.
You may be required to travel in some countries of your region to visit customers.

Experiences & Training
Engineering school graduate in IT / computer science.
Strong technical skills in software development and QA with Linux and Android devices.
Experience in Atlassian products (JIRA/Confluence) and ITSM rules is a plus.
Benefits
Competitive salary and performance-based bonuses.
Opportunities for career advancement and professional development.
Work with a passionate and talented team dedicated to success.

Title: MECHANICAL ENGINEER (BUILDING SERVICES)
Description:
I.EM Engineering Consultants is made up of a team of dedicated professionals who works closely with other design and construction professionals to provide a truly integrated, consistently innovative & cost-effective customized solutions to meet the changing needs of clients.
The company is conveniently located near Kovan MRT station and amenities and provides a conducive work environment that supports work life balance. The Company works hard to nurture a collaborative team, a culture that supports engineering innovation, teamwork and a team committed to deliver their best to the client.
Due to expansion plans, we are currently hiring senior engineers to support our Healthcare, Laboratory, Commercial & industrial projects. The person would be someone who has a strong technical background and aspires to develop his/her management skills.

Company Overview
Well establish boutique consultancy firm that handles new build industrial development, A&A works for hospital OTs, patient wards and laboratory as well as office and commercial fit up. Our office also carry out technical and due diligence audit as well as authorities submission to SCDF, PUB, SP Powergrid, NEA and IDA etc.
We are a group of dedicated engineers and designer who take pride in our work and looking for likeminded people to join us.

Why Join Us
Wide exposure and hands on project experience for professional and career progression.
Conducive working environment and work life balance.
Comprehensive in house and external technical training.

3 Selling Points
Working with A Team of Dedicated Professional with High Agility
Comprehensive In House Coaching & External Technical Training
Professional & Career Development

Benefits – Medical, Dental, Health Insurance, Annual Trip

Job Details
Position Title : Mechanical Engineer
Employment Type : Full Time
Position Level : Mid Level
Job Specialization : Engineering – Mechanical/Building Services
Monthly Salary : $4500 - $7000

Job Requirements
Education Level : Bachelor Degree
Field of Studies : Engineering Mechanical
Yrs of experience : 3

Main Role and Responsibilities
Planning and Design of Mechanical engineering works for building services projects to deliver buildable design within a timely manner, and economical service to meet client’s requirement.

Key Responsibilities
Design of mechanical services such as Air-Conditioning and Mechanical Ventilation, Fire Protection, Medical gas, Compress Air and Sanitary and Plumbing System etc.
Presentation of design concept report to client.
Preparation of M&E cost estimate base on approved design scheme.
Preparation of technical specifications and tender documentation.
Co-ordination of M&E services within the office.
Reviewing of shop drawings, material submissions and handle RFIs.
Verification of Work Progress and Variation Order for progress claim.
Liaise with main contractor, architect, authorities to ensure technical compliance and timely completion of project.
Carry out site investigation survey and submitting of technical reports.
Project Management from pre-development through to completion, including the following
Site Assessment and Inspection
Design development and co-ordination
Attend site meetings, technical meetings etc to resolve technical issues.
Following up with authorities on submissions, inspection and issuance of certification.
Prerequisites
Degree in Mechanical Engineering.
At least 3 years’ hands-on experience in design in an engineering consultancy firm for diploma holder.
Experience in handling full cycle of building service projects and proven track record with strong background in Air-Conditioning and Mechanical Ventilation Design.
Good understanding of Singapore Code of Practice and authority submission process.
Confident and have strong presentation & communication skills
Able to work independently as well as in a team setting
Fresh graduate is welcome.
Skills Requirement
AutoCAD
Microsoft office
We invite suitably qualified applicants to apply by sending their CV, outlining their work experiences, current, expected salary and contact details.

Title: Project Engineer, PSD, Mobility Rail
Description:
We are looking for a resourceful, energetic Project Engineer / Coordinator to join us. Project Engineers will have the opportunity to work on exciting, large-scale, turnkey projects in the transportation industry. The Project Engineer coordinates the work of multi-disciplinary engineering teams and manages external stakeholders such as customers, vendors, and interfacing parties.

This role provides leadership to cross functional teams in the development and implementation of railway products both domestically and globally. This requires facilitating workshops, managing schedules, coordinating timelines, consolidating reporting, and managing multiple processes for each phase of the project. Project Engineers will also be trained to be able to provides financial estimates and analysis for project planning and budgeting.
Software coding skills will be an advantage as it will allow the Project Engineer to develop useful automation and digitization tools.

We’re looking for Project Engineers with a background and passion in technical engineering. We believe that success as a Project Engineer is strongly influenced by your ability to appreciate technical details.

Organized and meticulous

Title: Assistant Shift Charge Engineers
Description:
Meranti Power Pte. Ltd., a fully owned subsidiary of Energy Market Authority, is establishing an Operations Department team to operate the gas turbines of our power generation station.

We are inviting applicants for the position of Assistant Shift Charge Engineers, who shall report to Head of Operations and is in-charge of supervision of the power station operations during shift duty to ensure safe, efficient operations and effective resolution of operation technical matters. The Assistant Shift Charge Engineer shall support Head, Operations and assume the following:

Responsibilities:
Manage and oversee the operation of the Power Plant in accordance to regulatory requirements and the Singapore Electricity Market Rules.
Ensure full compliance for environmental, health and safety in plant operations.
Prepare the monthly operations duty shift roster for the Operations Department. Organise the activities on shifts and allocates duties and responsibilities of Technical Officers.
Provide Technical Support for staff in relation to plant and equipment being operated at the power station to ensure continuous operation of the plant
Identify areas of operational concerns and any impacts or conflicts to ensure safe and efficient plant operations.
Monitor day to day progress and operations of the plant to ensure compliance with regulatory, statutory and company policies and procedures, housekeeping, safety practices and standards.
Monitor operational shift targets to ensure attainment of overall capacity plans
Ensure the availability of inputs (e.g. gas, diesel) for operational requirements for the shift
Prepare technical reports on the condition and activities of the plant including incidents.
Develop standard operation procedures and alarm responses to plant operation malfunction / abnormalies.

Requirements:
Education in Engineering or equivalent
Minimum 2 years’ of relevant experience in power plant operations
Possession of a steam boiler engineer 2nd class certification would be an advantage
Strong knowledge of engineering practices, functions and processes involved in the operation of a power station.
Ability to multitask, good team player and problem solver
Ability to communicate with staff in different functions
Must be willing to perform 12-hour shift on rotation basis when plant is operational
Work location is in Jurong Island (Transport to and from Jurong East MRT are provided)
Fresh graduates with the right aptitude are welcomed to apply.

Interested candidates, please forward your detailed resume, including last drawn salary, expected salary and date of availability to HR@merantipower.com.sg

Only shortlisted candidates will be notified.

By submitting your personal data and/or resume to Meranti Power Pte. Ltd. (“MP”) or to HR@merantipower.com.sg, you shall be deemed to have given your consent to MP for collecting, using, and disclosing your personal data for the purpose of assessing your job application.

Title: Senior Systems Engineer
Description:

Title: Project Engineer

Job Description

a) To report to the Manager or team leader as shown in the organization chart. He/she is responsible for the assigned or related project tasks and responsibilities.

i) Study and fully understand the ISO requirements, technical drawings, scope, contractual requirements and sub-contract agreements. Work with the consultants to resolve technical issues prior to construction.

ii) Submit to superior for feedback and concurrence on short or medium-term programmes and execute the works according to the detailed programme.

iii) Ensure that the works are carried out according to the approved drawings, quality procedures and EHS requirements. Managing the works with excellent housekeeping is a key focus.

iv) For quality management, the engineer is responsible to fully implement with the quality recordings, carry out result analysis and formulate action plans for continuous improvement.

v) Implement and maintain proper recordings to comply with EHS, quality, client and authorities’ requirements.

vi) Responsible for cost management so that the materials used for both temporary works and permanent works are not damaged or control the wastage within specified tolerance. Rework or abortive work which has serious time and cost impacts shall be avoided.

vii) Ad-hoc matters as assigned by the PM which is necessary for the execution of the project.

Title: Assistant Test Engineer
Description:
Cost and energy-efficient scaling of optical interconnects are increasingly becoming bottlenecks for Cloud and Artificial Intelligence (AI) applications. Rain Tree Photonics’ proprietary Silicon Photonics platform directly addresses these bottlenecks, enabling truly scalable optical interconnect solutions. As a Silicon Photonics chipmaker, Rain Tree Photonics (RTP) fully leverages the fabless eco-system and extends beyond with a unique fabless++ approach. In conjunction with its DFM Silicon Photonics platform and technology IPs, this enables RTP to deliver high-performance, low-power products in volume at low cost. By overcoming various challenges faced by customers when using silicon photonic chips, RTP is able to greatly reduce the development cycle time of customers and help them bring their products to the market quickly. A spin-off from IME, A*STAR, RTP is backed by renowned venture capitalist firms. The team includes a good mix of silicon photonics experts, industry veterans and talented PhDs from world-class universities. RTP is headquartered in Singapore, with a presence in China.
Job Description
We are looking for an Assistant Test Engineer to join our Test team. You will be working alongside other experienced R&D and Test team members with strong track records of transforming innovative and complex silicon photonic integrated circuits into mass-produced products in the market. The candidate should also be a self-driven and independent professional who can adapt to a fast-moving and vibrant technology development environment. Most importantly, you should be a good team player with a passion for working on cutting-edge technology and the desire to learn.
Responsibilities:
Support the daily smooth running of testing line.
Conduct assembly, test and troubleshooting on products and R&D prototypes.
Assist in maintenance and upkeep of test lab including test equipment and instruments
Provide technical and analytical support for the daily lab operation and implement standard operating procedures
Enjoys exploring new or unconventional testing and packaging processes and technologies.
Other tasks that may be assigned from time to time.
Requirements:
Diploma - Electronics or equivalent
Working experience in related industries (semiconductor, optoelectronics, electronics) is preferred. Fresh graduates are also welcome to apply.
Prior test experience preferred.
Team player and yet able to work independently and pro-actively
Possesses high level of integrity with good work ethics
Benefits
CPF, annual leave and public holidays
Full corporate insurance coverage
Convenient working location (walking distance from Tai Seng MRT)
Email your resume to Careers@raintreephotonics.com and reference JD-RTP230901

Title: Electronic Engineer
Description:
NACT Engineering provides drones accessories for all sizes and use-cases. Our intimate knowledge of robotics systems places us at the forefront of a burgeoning mechanical revolution. As a company at the cutting edge of engineering and robotics, we are looking for a suitable candidate that will push NACT forward as a bespoke drone solutions provider for our clients in the APAC region.
Highlights of working at NACT
Close proximity to many amenties along alexander road
Competitive compensation package remunerated based on skill and experience.
High level of autonomy on the job with training opportunities provided for upskilling and learning
Open culture and collaborative environment
High growth industry
Job description
Design and qualify electronic systems and/or electrical systems through prototyping validation.
Establish procedures for qualification of electronic/electrical system, and manual documentation for a team to adopt.
Conduct failure analysis of electronic/mechanical system to verify the cause of failures, and assist in arriving at the corresponding solution.
Assist with production quality control and production processes when needed.
Ensure compliance with company programs procedures and applicable quality system regulations and standards.
Position Responsibilities
Conduct tests necessary to evaluate prototype, such as using equipment such as oscilloscope, power supply, measurement tools etc.
Independently perform some level of failure analysis.
Supports equipment development efforts for new products, and process improvements. These efforts may be the internal development of process equipment or coordination with an external equipment integration company.
Supports processes. This support might include daily support of production operations as well as leading reliability and yield improvement activities for products.
May be expected to work on complex problems where analysis of situations or data requires an evaluation of many tangible and intangible factors. Individual will be required at times to make complex technical recommendations on design quality and reliability.
Writes Process Specifications and Manuals when applicable.
Supports Return Merchandise Authorization process by providing root cause analysis report.
Collaborates with Technical Experts from other software/hardware partners to implement new Product/ Process activities across the facilities following Technology Roadmaps and Design Engineering activities.
Performs other position related duties as assigned.
Quality Responsibilities
Reports any observed or informed process and/or product non-conformities.
Finds resolution of Quality Situations at the area of responsibility.
Complies with all the requirements in the operational procedures at the area of responsibility in order to meet the requirements of all applicable Quality System regulations.
Qualifications
Bachelor Degree in Science, Engineering or field related to previously mentioned background.
Experience:
Fresh graduates
Or: 1+ Years with Bachelors
Competitive compensation package remunerated based on skill and experience.

Title: Field Engineer
Description:
We are seeking a dedicated and skilled Field Engineer to join our team. In this role, you will collaborate closely with Project and Product Managers and Engineers to facilitate the testing of our products and solutions both in controlled lab environments and during field trials. You will be responsible for designing and executing comprehensive testing plans, ensuring the quality and performance of our offerings meet the highest standards.

Roles & Responsibilities
Collaborate with Project and Product Managers to organize field testing and demonstrations for Subnero's products and solutions.
Assist in the setup and configuration for customer demonstrations, test setups and field activities, including procuring necessary equipment, resources, and permits.
Design and develop protocols and procedures for a variety of internal and external projects and product/solution developments.
Execute test/demonstration plans in field locations, assessing product performance and functionality under real-world scenarios against a defined metric.
Collect and analyze data obtained from field deployments, identifying trends, anomalies, and areas for improvement.
Work closely with engineering and development teams to communicate test results, provide feedback, and contribute to product development.
Assist in troubleshooting technical issues encountered during testing and demonstration, working with the development engineers to find optimal solutions.
Maintain accurate records of activities, including test cases, results, and observations.
Collaborate with cross-functional teams to ensure alignment of testing and demonstration efforts with project timelines and objectives.

Qualifications
Bachelor's degree in Computer/Electrical Engineering, Computer Science, or a related field. Fresh graduates are welcome to apply.
Experience in basic software engineering to troubleshoot issues and develop simple test scripts.
Demonstrated experience in assisting Project and Product Managers with organizing and executing field activities and creating and implementing testing plans.
Strong analytical skills with attention to detail.
Effective communication and interpersonal skills, with the ability to work collaboratively in a team environment.
Willingness to travel and work in various field locations as required including on boats in local waters of Singapore.
Knowledge of relevant industry standards and regulations is a plus.
Ability to work independently across multiple time zones is a must.
Comfortable operating within a fast-paced environment.

Title: Software Support Engineer
Description:
A growing Singapore company, SendQuick is inviting motivated and talented individual to join the team as a Software Support Engineer. You should like to develop software and enjoy the challenges in solving software problems faced by customers. You will be trained on the various programming languages and will assist customers to troubleshoot and resolve software issues.

You are expected to be conversant in programming languages like PHP, Java, Javascript, Python and others. Experience with PERL and Linux is an added advantage. You will learn the programming and the development in various projects and be able to support customers independently. Support may involve onsite and online support.

You will work with a team of programmers to learn and may have opportunities to perform software development as well. A pleasant persinality, you enjoy talking to people and able to handle people especially technical people. Starting with Software Support Engineer, there is lateral movement to be a Software Developer for suitable candidates.

A good communicator, you should have a Diploma or Degree in Computing, Computer Science or similar qualifications. Fresh graduate or mature adults with relevant experience are welcome to apply. You should have at least 2 years experience in Software Development or Technical Support role. Fresh graduate who wish to embark on IT career is welcome.

Description:
Site Reliability Engineer (SRE)

Introduction
Kickstart your career with NTTS’s G.L.O.W Graduate Program, the ultimate launchpad for your tech career!

G – Grow in accelerated development path
L – Lead yourself with purpose & commitment
O – Own your career journey
W – Way Forward

Our comprehensive one-year program is tailored to empower talented and driven graduates like you with valuable hands-on experience, exposure to industry experts, and a diverse range of projects that will sharpen your skills and broaden your understanding to the ICT industry.

About the Role:
We're looking for a bright and motivated recent graduate (Computer Science or related field) to join our growing SRE team. In this role, you'll gain hands-on experience working alongside seasoned engineers to ensure the reliability, scalability, and performance of our critical systems and applications.

Responsibilities :

Adhere to best practices in software development.
Develop expertise in at least one Cloud Computing platform.
Develop expertise in building the CI-CD pipeline.
Take ownership of small parts of the project and see them through to completion.
Continuously learn and stay up to date with the latest SRE practices, tools (logging and monitoring) and technologies.
Qualifications:
Bachelor’s Degree, preferably in Computer Science, Information Technology, Engineering or related field.
Fresh graduate or less than 3 years of working experience.
Proficiency in at least one scripting language (Python, PowerShell, Ruby, Bash, etc.).
Familiarity with operating systems like Windows and/or Linux.
Strong in interpersonal skills.
Has excellent verbal/written communication and presentation skills.
Team player, resourcefulness, strong analytical skills is an advantage.

Title: Junior Software Engineer
Description:
IMPORTANT NOTES:
Please indicate your EXPECTED SALARY in your cover letter/ resume/ CV.
You shall have the legal rights to work in Singapore WITHOUT A WORK PASS.
Position Overview:
We're on the lookout for an Software Engineer with a fresh perspective and a keen interest in web development. This role is perfectly suited for recent university or bootcamp graduates who have dived into the MERN (MongoDB, Express.js, React, Node.js) or PERN (PostgreSQL, Express.js, React, Node.js) stacks, Next.js, or other cutting-edge web development technologies.
Your Role:
Work alongside our skilled team to design and develop robust web applications that stand out for their quality and user experience.
Contribute clean, efficient, and well-documented code to our projects, adhering to industry best practices.
Engage in constructive code review sessions to ensure high standards and foster a learning environment.
Take part in brainstorming sessions and contribute innovative ideas for new features or improvements.
Address and resolve application issues, optimizing for performance and scalability.
Stay abreast of the latest trends and advancements in web development technologies and methodologies.
What We’re Looking For:
A degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or related field, or significant learning and project experience from a coding bootcamp.
Hands-on experience with modern web development stacks like MERN, PERN, Next.js, or similar.
A solid grasp of software engineering fundamentals and the ability to tackle problems systematically.
Experience with version control systems, preferably Git.
A proactive approach to learning new technologies and frameworks.
Effective communication skills, with the ability to articulate ideas and collaborate with a team.
A portfolio showcasing projects and code samples is highly desirable.
Why Join Us:
Hybrid mode.
A competitive salary and comprehensive benefits package.
Opportunities for professional growth and advancement in a supportive learning environment.
Access to ongoing training and development programs to broaden your skill set.
A vibrant, inclusive company culture that values innovation, teamwork, and creativity.
Application Process:
Submit your application, including a resume, cover letter, and any relevant project portfolios or GitHub repositories. We're excited to see what you've built and learned!
REMINDER:
Please be reminded that you MUST have the legal rights to work in Singapore WITHOUT A WORK PASS. Please do NOT apply if you fail to meet this condition. We thank you for your cooperation.

Monday to Friday

Title: Junior Robotics Engineer
Description:
Job Title: Junior Robotics Engineer
Company: AiTreat
Location: Singapore
Department: Engineering
Reports to: Senior Robotics Engineer
Position Type: Full-time
Company Overview:
AiTreat is a pioneering company in the healthcare technology sector, renowned for developing innovative solutions that integrate traditional practices with modern technology. Our flagship product, the EMMA robotic system, represents a breakthrough in therapeutic robotics, offering automated massage and physiotherapy treatments that blend precision, efficiency, and traditional techniques. AiTreat is committed to enhancing patient care and advancing medical practices through technology.
Job Summary:
We are seeking a proactive and enthusiastic Junior Robotics Engineer with a knack for C++ and Linux systems to join our dynamic team. This role is a unique opportunity to contribute to the development and deployment of the revolutionary EMMA robotic system. Ideal for passionate individuals keen on robotics and programming, the position offers extensive learning opportunities, supported by government and company schemes.
Key Responsibilities:
Participate in the R&D of the EMMA robotic system, focusing on innovation and effectiveness.
Perform rigorous testing of codes, programs, and robotic treatment plans.
Assist in the deployment and maintenance of the EMMA system, ensuring high standards of operation and service.
Collaborate with senior engineers in refining and enhancing robotic functionalities.
Visit customer sites for system deployment, training, and maintenance, providing exceptional technical support.
Qualifications:
Proficiency in C++ programming within Linux environments.
Eagerness to learn and grow in the field of robotics, with a keen interest in healthcare technology.
Fresh graduates or candidates with relevant experience are encouraged to apply.
Willingness to travel within Singapore and overseas for project deployment and support.
Preferred Skills:
Experience with QT or other UI development tools, showcasing the ability to create intuitive user interfaces.
A good understanding of software development practices and life cycle.
Working Conditions:
Working hours: 10 am to 6:30 pm, Monday to Friday, and 10 am to 6 pm on Saturday and Sunday; flexible 5-day workweek based on mutual agreement. Public holidays off.
Job involves travel to customer sites for system deployment and ongoing support.
Salary:
Monthly salary ranging from SGD 4,000 to SGD 5,000, with an annual package of SGD 48,000 to SGD 60,000, based on experience and skills.
Join AiTreat and be part of a leading team dedicated to revolutionizing the healthcare industry with cutting-edge robotic technology. Apply now to build a rewarding career in robotics and make a tangible impact on people's lives with the EMMA system.

Independent, good team player and self-disciplined to succeed.

Comprehensive Cyber Security training will be provided to bring Graduate level or Junior level engineers up to speed. There will be a both an investment in desk training and on-the-job training.
The Opportunity
This will be an excellent opportunity for those who are about to graduate or have graduated and are seeking their steps into the Cyber Security world. Through this training program and Cyber Security firm, you will have the chance to develop and improving your skills.
What we are seeking for:
A degree related to Cyber Security, Information Security, Computer Science or similar
Certifications relating to Cyber Security training is an advantage (not required)
Internship experience or part time or any work experience relating to IT Security or Cybersecurity (advantageous)
General knowledge of the Cyber Security industry, trends, updates, news, interests
Good grasp of basic concepts of Cyber Security solutions (i.e. SIEM, UEBA, SOAR, Endpoint, DLP, Threat Analysis, ML/AI, Firewall, IPS and any other types of security)
Showing a strong initiative, motivation, and drive towards learning Cyber Security
Ability to communicate well, hold a discussion, ability to speak up and confidently
Strong critical thinking and problem-solving skills and a passion for information/Cyber security
What Is On Offer:
Permanent position
Comprehensive training provided to graduates and juniors
Expansion plans and opportunities for further progression
Competitive remuneration and benefits
Excellent Cyber Security exposure on major public and private projects
What’s Next:
If you are interested to join this Cyber Security firm and to be an integral part of their growth across South East Asia region then we would like to hear from you.
Full support and training will be provided to meet your career objectives.
Please reply directly to this posting with your CV or send us your details to application@engagegroup.com.sg
We apologise that due to the high volume of applicants we may be unable to respond to everyone. Should you not hear from us, please assume your application was unsuccessful for this time round and good luck for the next.

Title: Reliability Engineer
Description:
Job Summary

Salary
S$4,000 - S$4,700 / Monthly

Job Type

Seniority
Junior

Years of Experience
At least 2 years

Job Description


About GlobalFoundries
GlobalFoundries is a leading full-service semiconductor foundry providing a unique combination of design, development, and fabrication services to some of the world’s most inspired technology companies With a global manufacturing footprint spanning three continents, GlobalFoundries makes possible the technologies and systems that transform industries and give customers the power to shape their markets For more information, visit www.globalfoundries.com

Introduction
A Reliability Engineer perform stress test & evaluate the device/product lifecycle and highlight any failures or issues. Focus area is on memory device and CPI reliability. The candidate will provide support to the organization on reliability setup, test & analysis, work with vendor and support customer engagement.
Your Job
SRAM/Flash/NVM/OTP/MTP/eFUSE/CPI reliability setup & analysis, and handle PRM (Periodic reliability monitoring)
Work with customer/vendor to design & bring in hardware & software for reliability characterization.
Establish wafer and/or package level test methodologies and test program.
Support customer engagement in reliability aspects. Provide reliability presentations for customer visit. Participate in reliability risk assessment meetings with customers.
Required Qualifications:
Education - Bachelor/Master/PhD degree in Engineering or Science.
Years of Experience - 2 years of relevant experience in reliability tests.
Fresh graduate is welcome to apply.
Knowledge of wafer fabrication.
Knowledge of MOS Device Physics and Reliability Statistics.
Fluency in English Language – written & verbal.
Preferred Qualifications:
Team player with good people skill.
Able to work under tight project timeline.

Title: Sales Engineer
Description:
Job Description: Sales Engineer - Electronic Security Systems
Position Overview: We are seeking a motivated and results-driven Sales Engineer specializing in Electronic Security Systems to join our dynamic sales team. As a Sales Engineer, you will play a crucial role in promoting and selling our comprehensive range of electronic security solutions to clients and businesses. Your technical expertise, combined with excellent interpersonal and communication skills, will enable you to effectively understand customer needs, propose tailored solutions, and drive revenue growth.
Responsibilities:
Identify and Generate Leads: Research, identify, and develop new business opportunities within the electronic security systems market. Proactively seek out potential clients, build relationships, and generate qualified leads.
Consultative Selling: Understand customer requirements, challenges, and pain points related to electronic security systems. Conduct thorough needs assessments and provide tailored recommendations to meet their specific needs. Present technical proposals and solutions that align with customer requirements and business objectives.
Product Demonstrations and Presentations: Conduct compelling product demonstrations and presentations to prospective clients. Showcase the features, advantages, and benefits of our electronic security systems, addressing technical queries and concerns effectively.
Solution Design and Proposal Development: Collaborate with the technical team to design and customize electronic security system solutions that align with customer needs. Develop comprehensive proposals, including cost estimates, scope of work, and project timelines.
Negotiation and Closing: Engage in pricing negotiations and contract discussions with customers. Work closely with the sales team to ensure successful deal closure, meeting or exceeding sales targets and revenue objectives.
Relationship Management: Build and maintain strong relationships with clients, contractors, architects, and consultants. Provide ongoing customer support and act as a technical point of contact to address post-sales inquiries and issues.
Market Research and Competitor Analysis: Stay updated with industry trends, emerging technologies, and competitor activities. Conduct market research to identify new market segments, potential partnerships, and business growth opportunities.
Collaboration and Knowledge Sharing: Collaborate with cross-functional teams, including engineering, operations, and project management, to ensure seamless execution of projects and customer satisfaction. Share industry knowledge and best practices within the sales team.
Collaborate with project teams to ensure the successful execution of security projects, including technical design, installation, and troubleshooting.
Requirements:
Education and Experience:
Technical Knowledge:
Sales Skills:
Diploma/ Bachelor's degree in Electrical Engineering, Computer Science, or a related technical field.
Proven experience in sales engineering or technical sales roles within the electronic security systems industry.
Strong understanding of electronic security systems, such as access control, video surveillance, intrusion detection, and fire alarm systems.
Proficient knowledge of electronic security system technologies, including hardware, software, and integration capabilities.
Familiarity with industry standards and regulations related to electronic security systems.
Ability to analyze customer requirements and design comprehensive security solutions.
Proven track record of achieving sales targets and driving revenue growth.
Excellent communication and presentation skills, with the ability to convey complex technical concepts to both technical and non-technical stakeholders.
Strong negotiation and closing skills.
Fresh graduates are welcome to apply.

Title: Academy Data Engineer (Fresh Grad are Welcome)
Description:
Job Summary

Salary
S$3,000 - S$4,500 / Monthly

Job Type

Seniority
Junior

Years of Experience
At least 1 year

Tech Stacks
ETL Snowflake AWS Analytics Spark Streaming Sqoop Cloudera HDFS Apache Azure Java Hive Impala Spark kafka SQL Hadoop Python

Job Description
Project Description:Hiring to create the future ready Data & Analytics professional!
Luxoft, a DXC Technology Company has embarked upon an extensive multi-year program to hire and upskill professionals and engage them in projects involving cutting edge data & analytics solutions for our extensive global clientele.
If you wish to progress your career into next gen data engineering, visualization, and advanced analytics solutions this opportunity is for you. We seek highly energetic Fresh Professionals with 0 to 3 years or Mid-Career Professionals with more than 3 years of experience having fundamental programming skills, analytical thinking, data concepts and a great passion to learn. Prior extensive experience in data & analytics projects is not mandatory but a definite plus.
Applicants need to be Singapore citizens.
This engagement shall involve an extensive 12 months training program (for Fresh Professionals) and 6 months training program (for Mid-Career Professionals) well interlaced with embedded on the job training in live internal or client projects. Post completion of training the candidate shall be certified as a "Data Warehouse & Big Data Professional" ready to be immediately deployed into client projects

Training details
In the course of this engagement candidates shall be trained on a variety of cutting edge data & analytics technologies such as:
1. Data modelling using different schema patterns such as Star/Snowflake/DataVault in Data Warehouse or Data Mining
2. Python programming
3. Hadoop architecture & HDFS storage platforms
4. Tools like Sqoop for Ingestion of data from source systems to HDFS
5. Apache Kafka architecture to create topics and partitions
6. ETL job development, monitoring & optimization using Hive script & Impala
7. Spark programming - Spark SQL, Spark Streaming
8. Data pipeline setup, analysis, insights & analytics using end to end data solutioning platforms such as Cloudera leveraging cloud infrastructure on AWS or Azure
9. Data quality, governance & security technologies

Training program shall also include other topics such as:
1. Communication management
2. Stakeholder management
3. Change management
4. Creative & computational thinking
5. Business analysis

Possible Roles post training period:
1. Data engineer
2. Data architect
3. Data visualization & analytics expert
4. Advanced data analytics expert
5. AI/ML expert
Responsibilities:
Demonstrate passion to learn cutting edge big data technologies
Consistently participate in the training sessions and learning programs
Actively engage and apply learnings into live internal or client projects during course of the training

Mandatory Skills Description:
A good degree, postgraduate or Diploma qualification in IT Engineering
Fresh Professionals (0-3 years of work experience) or Mid-Career Professionals (3+ years of work experience) in IT, along with good knowledge in data structures, SQL and Java OR Python
Analytical and problem-solving skills
Strong written and spoken communication skills and interpersonal skills

Nice-to-Have Skills:
Fundamental understanding of Big Data concepts (academic trainings or certifications)
Experience in financial services domain

Title: (Assistant) UHPC Engineer
Description:
ceEntek, an international company providing innovative solutions to worldwide construction industry, searching for creative engineering candidates of various experience levels to assist in developing the Company’s product by continuous research activities.
Become a catalyst for change with ceEntek!
ABOUT THE COMPANY
Concrete is one of the world’s most used materials and one of the most polluting industries. ceEntek is changing the way structures are built towards a greener and lasting future by producing the world’s only Carbon Nano Fiber (CNF) enhanced Ultra-High Performance Concrete (UHPC). ceEntek’s solution to worldwide construction challenges are less mass, less steel, less time to completion, with extended durability based on leading cutting-edge nano technology with unmatched sustainability. Our technology is simple, safe, stable.
We work with an international team of unique experts to develop and bring innovative ideas to life.
ABOUT THE ROLE
The role is about developing the Company’s product by continuous research activities, with deep exposure to scientific data and best global practices in technology. It's a hands-on role, primarily laboratory-based, requires a good combination of strategic vision and attention to details.
PRIMARY JOB DUTIES
Research and develop (nano-engineered) ultra high performance concrete products (UHPC) for various applications.
Manage the product/system assigned (from mix design to R&D to commercialization).
Evaluate and optimize construction materials e.g. cement, sand, supplementary contentious materials into various UHPC formulations.
Establish and handle various laboratory tests related to concrete properties measurements (mechanical and durability testing etc.).
Support business development activities (technical and application sides).
Be responsible for assigned lab equipment and tools, participate in continuous laboratory improvement activities.
Reporting, project planning, troubleshooting.
Perform UHPC mixing and/or casting activities on-site from time to time.
Understand and implement testing standards and participate in new in-house SOP preparation work.
ABOUT YOU
A Degree of Material Science or Chemical studies / Civil Engineering. Fresh graduates with keen interest in concrete R&D
Responsible, attentive to details, hardworking, team player, positive attitude
Creative and curious mindset
Fluent/business English
JOB CONDITIONS
Salary + AWS
Medical insurance (incl. dental care)
Fully-equipped office and scientific/manufacturing premises in one place
A team of visionaries, game changers

Salary: $2,500.00 - $4,500.00 per month

Title: EHS Engineer
Company: GOODRICH AEROSTRUCTURES SERVICE CENTER - ASIA PTE....
Description:
Responsibilities
The Environmental, Health and Safety (EHS) Engineer is responsible for developing, implementing, and continually improving company’s safety and health programs and procedures to ensure personnel and plant wide Health and Safety. This individual is required to monitor and conduct EHS audits to identify level of implementation & effectiveness of EHS management system, identify & recommend measures/approaches to close gaps/improve the management system. He/she will also be liaising with inter-departments and external organizations on EHS compliance issues.
Supports site's compliance with WSH Regulations.
Develop and enforce EHS programs, procedures, reports, permits and training as well as to cultivate & promote EHS Safety Culture within the organization
Manage and lead in the monitoring and controlling of safety standards in accordance with local regulations code of practice and RTX Corporate EHS requirement.
Manage Management Of Change (MOC) program for timely closure.
Monitor and track timely completion of activities, initiatives and action items in Corporate SMART Reporting System, while supporting PDPR Dashboard Reporting.
Drive effective Waste Management.
Manage and maintain the facilities to ensure compliant with local EHS regulations.
Develops environmental regulatory reports and submissions to achieve and maintain standard documentation.
Ensure organization meets all legal licensing requirements with regards to occupational health and safety.
Lead and conduct safety inspections
Develop and conduct inspection & audit program by identifying root causes of deficiencies and completion of preventive and corrective actions.
Establish & lead trend analysis, audits, accident investigations and site inspections of operational procedures, facility design, equipment and materials.
Evaluates new hazardous materials to ensure compliance to all safety rules and regulations pertaining to the work are conscientiously observed & in compliance.
Drive deployment of corporate programs independently.
Oversee Industrial Hygiene Screening for site personnel.
Leverage continuous improvement processes and tools (CORE) to improve EHS & Facilities performance
Drive & champion Behavior Based Safety System.
Conduct trainings to educate organization of best practices and regulatory/corporate requirements when necessary.
Assist in coordinating with IFM in facilities maintenance and building services.
Manage site security and access system, ensuring security and emergency preparedness procedures are implemented properly.
Requirements:
Degree in Safety, Health & Environmental Engineering.
Specialist Diploma in Occupational Health & Industrial Hygiene is a plus.
Minimum 3 years’ experience in the EHS profession. Fresh graduates will be considered for the role.
Experience in planning, development and implementation of EHS management systems and compliance
programs.
Lead and drive hazard identification and risk assessment methodology.
Good knowledge of local legislation (eg. WSH/NEA/SCDF), BIZSAFE, ISO 14001 & 45001 requirements.
Fire Safety Manager and/or WSHO is an added advantage.
Analytical, meticulous, resourceful and able to meet tight deadlines in a fast-paced work environment.
A team player with good communication, interpersonal and organising skills.

Title: Project QA/QC Engineers "#SGUnitedJobs"
Company: SIDDHAN BUSINESS SERVICES ASIA PTE. LTD.
Description:
The Project QAQC Engineer applies engineering principles and techniques to manage project issues in a construction environment to meet organizational objectives. His/her works also include evaluating the project implementation, quality and safety of construction project. Reporting to the Project Manager administratively and QAQC Manager technically, the candidate will be responsible for assuring the implementation and compliance with the Quality Assurance System and for scope of work related to Mechanical equipment (HVAC and Piping) trades on the project in Singapore.
In addition, the Project QA/QC Engineer leads project site improvement projects, and is expected to implement site quality programmes in accordance with organizational objectives.
The Project Engineer (QA/QC) is responsible for assisting the project manager in ensuring the quality standards of all construction trades with developed skills in quality control, construction management, construction supervision, quality assurance, monitoring issues pertaining to all Quality related matter including drawing and specifications. Responsible on QA/QC Plans, formulate checklist, inspection and procedures as well. He/She is also required to ensure compliance with workplace safety, health and other regulatory requirements in his/her line. He/She is also required to ensure compliance with workplace safety, health and other regulatory requirements and have basic understanding of the International standards like ASME, AWS, ASTM, ASHRAE, SMACNA, and BPE.

The Project QAQC Engineer is required to have strong communication skills to lead a team to meet organizational outcomes. He/She is expected to guide and mentor the Assistant Engineers under his/her charges.

JOB REQUIREMENTS
Preparation of Project Quality Plan (PQP) and carry out Internal Audit as scheduled in the PQP. Preparation of Inspection and Testing Plan (ITP) according to various Standard.
Perform all daily inspection and test of the scope and character necessary to achieve the quality of construction required in the drawings and specifications for all works under the project performed ON or OFF site.
Carrying out inspection and checking for all quality related procedures in the site and ensures activity at site are as per approved method statement and ITP.
Coordinate with the client’s representative and/or Site in-charge for inspection and meeting about quality problems including closure of Non-Compliance Report.
Taking care of QA/QC documents of the entire project including certificates, calibration, test results, inspection requests, non-compliance reports and site instruction/ observations, permanent materials, equipment delivered and other QA/QC documents.
Responsible for closure of Non-conformance (NCR) and Site Instruction (SI).
Responsible in the quality and workmanship of all activities, thorough knowledge of all phases of engineering. Fabrication and Construction in relation to Mechanical, Structural, and Electrical discipline interfacing the multidisciplinary operations
Performs line check on the completed or erected pipe line, ensuring proper installation according to allowable standard
Liaising with client and installation team and comply with inspection requirements
Monitoring job progress and ensure quality work at targeted schedule, Preparation of reports on job status and project completion
Verifying of P&IDs and layout drawings on the test packages are in current revision as approved by the client
Performing test packages and endure that the test pressure, test medium and test limits are properly specified.
Supervising and leading a team of workers and sub-contractors to perform works on-site
Inspection of equipment, structural steel, piping, equipment to ensure proper handling and documentation over to clients
To review, witness, monitor and check the WPS, PQR and Welder Qualification Test record, and witness Qualification Test contractor
Implement Quality Culture across the project by working with Trade contractors, Main contractors QA Manger and execute as per project requirements deliverables.
Attend weekly and as and when required by Client QA/QC meeting and resolve all QA/QC related issues if any and ensure that proactively work towards achieving the best in quality deliverables for this project.
Follow up on the Root Cause Analysis (RCA) and ensure that any NCR raised is addressed with CAPA action plans and implement them on time.
To coordinate and arrange and call for all inspections at various stages as per approved ITP with Main contractors, Client and Subcontractors.
Compile vendor/final turnover dossier and manufacturing data records and Final handover to Client.
Work with the Start-up Manager and Field Manager to develop and administer the various systems Walk downs/Punch lists close out/ testing and commissioning/Final Documentation Handover including Mechanical and Substantial Completion to Client.
Coordinate with Project Engineers for technical assistance, generating Root Cause Analysis (RCA) for Client-requested quality observations, and project closeout
To prepare and maintain all test results and final QC acceptance documents.
To perform inspection of all Mechanical and Electrical equipment, installations, in process inspections and maintain the records.
Review approved equipment fabrication, erection, installation and commissioning using relevant drawings and architectural drawings, and ensure compliance with the construction specifications
Work together with the OFE vendors and CFE vendors, suppliers to ensure that the fabrication, erection and installation of all M & E equipment and to properly document the quality process, tracking and final turnover of the same.
Play a proactive role with field inspections, together with the subcontractors and the Client in developing pre-test plans prior to contractual testing and stay ahead of normally scheduled inspections with the authorities.
Assist the contractor in resolution of known issues and lessons learned from other sites
Assist with onsite/remote BIM 360 Field training of new Trade Partners / site personnel (iPad and Desktop) and competency with BIM 360 Field or equivalent software to create issues, capture QA/QC related issues, and create checklists.
QUALIFICATIONS AND EXPERIENCE
Require minimum 1-2 years relevant working experience in a construction project environment industry; Fresh University Graduates will be considered for this role.
Bachelor degree or higher in Mechanical Engineering or equivalent degree;
Good knowledge of local and international codes, standards and regulations;
Good coordination of administrative skills and able to multi task.
Excellent communication and interpersonal skills.
Positive attitude and a team player

Title: AUTOMATION ENGINEER
Description:
Our office seeks an experienced PLC /SCADA Programmer. This position will be responsible for programming automation and controls systems involving PLCs (programmable logic controllers).
